title: Hera's Trials
description: Hera, being the queen of the gods, can represent authority and unpredictability, symbolizing a challenge that tests various abilities.
rules: Rule 1: Teams must consist of 4 members.
Rule 2: No mobile phones or outside help allowed.
Rule 3: Judges' decisions are final and binding.
Rule 4: All participants must arrive 15 minutes prior to the event start time.

title: Apollo’s Luminous Lens
description: Luminous adds a more dynamic and radiant feel, making it stand out while still connecting with Apollo’s association with light and creativity in photography.
rules: Rule 1: Each team can have a maximum of 2 members.
Rule 2: All photos must be taken during the event.
Rule 3: Judges' decisions are final.

title: Ares Techwar
description: Has a modern and tech-savvy vibe, linking the idea of a competitive environment (war) with the concept of complex problem-solving (matrix). It captures both the essence of a hackathon and Ares' spirit of conflict.
rules: Rule 1: Teams must consist of 4 members.
Rule 2: Code must be written during the event.
Rule 3: Judges' decisions are final.

title: Poseidon’s Code Current
description: This name reflects the flow and movement of coding and debugging, evoking Poseidon’s control over water currents.
rules: Rule 1: Teams can have a maximum of 2 members.
Rule 2: No outside help is allowed.
Rule 3: Judges' decisions are final.

title: Hephaestus' Forge
description: Hephaestus, god of fire and craftsmanship, relates well to IoT, where devices are 'forged' and connected in the digital world.
rules: Rule 1: Teams must consist of 3 members.
Rule 2: No outside help allowed.
Rule 3: Judges' decisions are final.

title: Hermes' Bytechase
description: Hermes, the swift messenger god, fits perfectly with Capture the Flag, where speed and strategy are key.
rules: Rule 1: Teams must consist of 2 members.
Rule 2: No outside help allowed.
Rule 3: Judges' decisions are final.

title: Aphrodite's Aurora
description: This name emphasizes beauty and design, aligning perfectly with UI/UX while maintaining a connection to Aphrodite.
rules: Rule 1: Teams must consist of 3 members.
Rule 2: Judges' decisions are final.

title: Dionysus' Battleground
description: Effectively conveys the competitive and intense nature of a PUBG gaming event while linking it to Dionysus's theme of revelry and excitement.
rules: Rule 1: Teams must consist of 4 members.
Rule 2: Judges' decisions are final.

title: Artemis' Adventure
description: This adds an air of intrigue and excitement, enhancing the adventurous theme of the treasure hunt!
rules: Rule 1: Teams must consist of 3 members.
Rule 2: Judges' decisions are final.

title: Hades' Tech Authority
description: Emphasizes leadership and management in the IT field, while still connecting to Hades as the ruler of the underworld.
rules: Rule 1: Each participant must register individually.
Rule 2: Judges' decisions are final.

title: HERMES' BYTECHASE
description: Emphasizes leadership and management in the IT field, while still connecting to Hades as the ruler of the underworld.
rules: Rule 1: Each participant must register individually.
